items.sentence: I wonder how much money Tom has in the bank.
I wonder if Tom will go to Boston next week.
I wonder when this building was constructed.
I wonder where she had her photograph taken.
Tom came into my office and closed the door.
Tom certainly knows how to entertain people.
I figured you might know why Tom left early.
I forgot that Tom used to live in Australia.
I found out when Tom graduated from college.
Tom poured the remaining beer into the sink.
Tom practices playing the bassoon every day.
Tom prefers his clothes to be loose-fitting.
Tom pretended not to hear what was going on.
Tom likes to watch other people play tennis.
Tom looked nothing like his profile picture.
Tom looked through the peephole in the door.
How long do you plan to stay on this island?
How long do you think the meeting will last?
How long do you think this is going to last?
How long have Tom and Mary known each other?
How long have you two been working together?
When did you notice your wallet was missing?
My father graduated from Harvard University.
My father has never gotten sick in his life.
My father reads the newspaper every morning.
My father smokes a pack of cigarettes a day.
My hobby is taking pictures of wild flowers.
Why wouldn\'t you let me go to Tom\'s party?
Tom hardly ever does what he says he\'ll do.
Tom refused Mary\'s offer to drive him home.
Tom has found an interesting way to do that.
Tom has made several bad decisions recently.
Tom has no idea where Mary wants to do that.
Tom has received a lot of letters from Mary.
Tom has some serious psychological problems.
Tom has three times as many books as I have.
I have several friends who can speak French.
I have the right to express my own opinions.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary\'s shoe size is.
Were you the one who told Tom what happened?
Tom has already been told he can\'t do that.
Tom has borrowed Mary\'s car for a few days.
Tom hasn\'t been over to my house for weeks.
When do you think you\'re going to get here?
I know a lot of people don\'t agree with me.
I know most people here can\'t speak French.
I know most people here don\'t like fishing.
I need to find out when we need to be there.
Tom comes to visit me every once in a while.
Tom confessed that he had broken the window.
